items.content_html: qryn is an indie polyglot, lightweight high-performance observability stack with ClickHouse storage, designed to ingest and analyze logs, metrics and traces from any agent compatible with Loki, Prometheus, OTLP, Tempo, Elastic, InfluxDB, Opentelemetry and more! Grafana Cloud, Splunk, Datadog, Otel drop-in alternative
